name: The man who doesn't like dice
name_original: The man who doesn't like dice
description:
a man has to kill dinosaurs that come out of the dice    

you have to destroy all the dice.

the higher the number on the dice, the more life points the dice will have but it spawn less enemies.

if the number on the dice is low, enemies spawn faster.

numbers on the three dice are determined at the beginning.

those will repeat but everytime you finish one, you gain some speed and shooting speed but enemies kick you harder and they get more lives.

ENJOY (legends says that you only enjoy games if you rate this one good... joking haha... maybe)

"very fun game" -  my dog

this game was designed and programmed in lua with Love2d framework by Makesan

and Sound Designed by Galactic Noise AKA Galaknoise : https://galaknoise.itch.io

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD / ZQSD to move your character

SPACE to shoot

ARROWS KEYS  to change direction

THE GAME CLOSING WHEN YOU DIE IS NOT A BUG, ITS A      F E A T U R E
